function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Temporary suspension of evictions in multiple countries","Impact":"Increased risk of overcrowding and higher probability of disease transmission in indoor spaces","Mitigation":"Implement strict social distancing measures and ventilation requirements in indoor spaces","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC systems with HEPA filters","People":"Tenants, landlords, and property owners","Owner":"Local authorities and property management companies"},{"Description":"Mortgage and rent payment suspensions in multiple countries","Impact":"Financial strain on landlords and property owners, leading to neglected maintenance and sanitation","Mitigation":"Provide financial relief and assistance to landlords and property owners to ensure maintenance and sanitation standards are upheld","Technologies":"Financial assistance programs, online payment systems","People":"Property owners, landlords, and tenants","Owner":"Government agencies and financial institutions"},{"Description":"Support measures for construction industry and utility bill payment","Impact":"Potential increase in construction activities and utility usage leading to higher population density and resource strain","Mitigation":"Enforce strict zoning regulations, monitor construction activities, and encourage energy-efficient practices","Technologies":"Smart grid technology, energy-efficient construction materials","People":"Construction workers, utility companies, and local residents","Owner":"Government agencies and utility providers"}]}
